intro.title: Hi, I am Gaël
intro.subtitle: I code beautifully simple things, and I love what I do.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm based in Antibes, France
about.p1: Back in 2022, I decided to try my hand at creating a website and tumbled head first into the rabbit hole of coding and web development. Fast-forward to today.
about.p2: I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my chops one design problem at a time.
about.p3: When I’m not at the computer, I’m usually cycling, scuba diving or hanging out with my wife and our two little monsters.

work.title: My Work
work.subtitle: A selection of my range of work
